name: Match the Deck
description:
Match the Deck takes the much loved match 3+ game mechanics and adds strategy and depth, by making you build a deck of Cards!

Rules :
- Match a suit by dragging left/right/up/down and diagonally.
- The amount you select represent a Card. ie. selecting 6 diamonds = the Card 6 of Diamonds.
- You must clear every card in the Deck of Cards.
- You get points for adding a card. However you lose points if you add the same card again.
- You win when all the cards are gone. However you lose if your score reaches below 0.

With a pleasing minimalistic design, try to beat others on the leaderboard or get lost in the zen of matching suits.
